div.p: Thank you to our Bear Family for working with us during this time. If you have any questions on assignments or expectations our administration and teachers will be on hand to assist.
Teachers will be available for Office Hours at designated times to help with instruction.
Paper Based Assignments will be delivered on Monday March 23rd during the mid morning by staff members. Online classes will be available Friday, March 20th.
Guidelines and instructions for online logins will be hand delivered as well, but additional information is below for ease of access.

h2.span: – Thank you to Region 8 for developing these resources!

div.p: Please click on the picture to access the link

p.span: Students will have their login credentials or can get them from instructors

div.p: All Secondary students will be enrolled in online classes through Edmentum to complete second semester if the class is offered. Some classes may need to be offered through Google Classroom. Those needing paper based or low-tech options will be accommodated by instructors who will prepare engaging lessons.

p.span: IXL also has an app that is user friendly.
Elementary teachers will distribute usernames and passwords.

Students will receive or have received a class code from instructors in order to access Google Classroom. Assignments and information on lessons can be uploaded by teachers directly to the class. Students can turn in assignments through this medium as well.
